mapper.select: SELECT bro.id, bro.organization_id organizationId, bro.organization_site_id organizationSiteId, bro.recommend_organization_id recommendOrganizationId, bro.sort FROM base_recommend_organization bro WHERE bro.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND bro.recommend_organization_id = #{recommendOrganizationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_recommend_organization ( organization_id, organization_site_id, recommend_organization_id, sort ) VALUES ( #{organizationId}, #{organizationSiteId}, #{recommendOrganizationId}, #{sort} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(bro.sort) maxSort FROM base_recommend_organization bro WHERE organization_id = #{organizationId}

SELECT bro.id, bro.organization_id organizationId, bro.recommend_organization_id recommendOrganizationId, bo.`name` recommendOrganizationName, bo.organization_type_id recommendOrganizationTypeId, bot.`name` recommendOrganizationTypeName, bo.`status` recommendOrganizationStatus, bo.remark recommendOrganizationRemark, bro.sort FROM base_recommend_organization bro LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bo.id = bro.recommend_organization_id LEFT JOIN base_organization_type bot ON bot.id = bo.organization_type_id where bro.id = #{id}
